name: Mountain Language
description:
Made for the Bitsy Game Swap 1 Jam hosted by Sarah Gould.

I was assigned the theme "travel or longing" by Hangedman. "Travel" made me think of mountains. I wasn't exactly sure what "longing" meant, so I looked it up, and one of the most common usage examples was "longing for freedom". My brain put the two things together, and I remembered Mountain Language, a short play by Harold Pinter – all the text in this Bitsy piece comes from it.

Press the right arrow / swipe right to advance the text.

Made using Bitsy by Adam Le Doux. Visual created with the Image to Bitsy tool by ruin. Thanks to the Bitsy community for being incredibly inspiring.
